title: Your Effort
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Ugh, I can’t play it at all! My left and right hands are completely out of sync~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s okay, it’s okay. It’ll become natural to you the more you practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yup. I know how to play because I practiced a lot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>How much have you practiced?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmm...... every day ever since I started learning to play the piano, up to now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Whaaaat!? Up to now!? Every day!? Even on school trips!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yup, yup. The only days I don’t play are when I don’t have a piano.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Whaaat... Riko-chan, you’re amazing. I was pretty dumb to think that it would be easy to play as you do, Riko-chan. Sorry about that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>No need to apologize! I’m already happy that you said you were interested in learning to play the piano, Chika-chan. Just play with one hand for now, and keep trying hard, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
